name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: AMZWathdog Amazon FBA Seller Analytics Tool

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: AMZWatchdog, an ultimate Amazon Seller and Reviewer Analytics Tool allow Amazon sellers insight into competitors and reviewers.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
AMZWatchdog, an ultimate Amazon Seller and Reviewer Analytics Tool allow Amazon sellers insight into competitors and reviewers.

This is a productive tool that gives you at-a-glance insight into the basic information and strengths of your Amazon FBA competitors. You could know if they are from China.

It also lets you discover the basic information about reviewers and even show their social media, such as Facebook, Instagram, and YouTube. That makes you could reach out to them and ask them to review your products.

In a word, AMZWatchdog is a great must-have tool to improve your efficiency as an FBA seller.

Basic information about your competitors

- Region, where is the seller located.
- Feedback, how much feedback did the seller get during the last 30 days.
- Product, how many listings are selling now.

Basic information about reviewers

- Rank, the rank in reviewers
- Impact, how much helpful feedback got
- Reviews, how many reviews did the reviewer contribute.
